subject: Tour of California (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Robert Gesink of the Netherlands claimed the day’s honors and Levi Leipheimer became the third overall race leader Wednesday in the mountainous third stage of the Tour of California.
snippet: Robert Gesink of the Netherlands claimed the day’s honors and Levi Leipheimer became the third overall race leader Wednesday in the mountainous third stage of the Tour of California.
